short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark theme for the sites that don't provide one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you prefer using dark theme but find yourself at the page that only can can be viewed on its white background, this extension can help make your browsing less disturbing. Click on the extensions icon and the colors will be inverted and a bit softened. The extension will try its best to revert images to their original look, but in rare cases some of them may appear as negatives.
